New Records: Jaime Jaquez Jr. tied a season-high for made 3s in a single game
Key Match Events: Jaime Jaquez Jr.'s critical above-the-break 3-pointer to put the Heat ahead by five points with 1:03 left
Lauri Markkanen had a game-high six made 3-pointers on 15 attempts
Post-Match Reflections: Jimmy Butler's absence and the team's recent play have sparked optimism around the team
Players like Jaquez and Jovic are flourishing in Butler's absence
The team is still making avoidable mistakes, especially careless turnovers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat's win moves them to 19-17, while the tanking Jazz drop to 9-27
The Heat will have a prime opportunity to extend their winning streak to three games against the Portland Trail Blazers
Tyler Herro led the way with 23 points, seven rebounds and five assists on 7-of-17 shooting
Others: Jaime Jaquez Jr.'s growth and development as a player
The team's reliance on young players like Jaquez, Jovic, and Ware
The possibility of trading Jimmy Butler for a player like Brandon Ingram
